Grease.effect: An 4m square area becomes difficult terrain.

Sleep.effect: 2HD/level worth of targets in 30 ft. fall asleep.

Arcane Arrow.effect: Fire a magic bolt 40m dealing 1d4 damage to all targets in line.

Detect Magic.effect: You sense all near magic. A relevant check might be required to learn its function.

Charm.effect: One creature in 30 ft. is friendly towards you.

Command.effect: Speak a one-word command to a target.

Protection from Evil.effect: Proficiency on resisting the next [ your level ] attacks and effects.

Blindness/Deafness.effect: Blind or deafen one creature within sight.

Holy Weapon.effect: Empower a weapon to deal double damage to undead.
